language.title: Language
language.description: Select a display language for App Manager.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Select a display theme for App Manager.

installsLocation.title: Installs Location
installsLocation.description: Select a location for new installs. Existing installs will not be affected.

downloadsLocation.title: Downloads Location
downloadsLocation.description: Select a location for new downloads.

installsLocation.title: Installs Location
installsLocation.dialog: App Manager > Settings > Installs > Installs Location

downloadsLocation.title: Downloads Location
downloadsLocation.dialog: App Manager > Settings > Installs > Downloads Location

checkForUpdates.title: Check for Updates
checkForUpdates.description: Determines how often App Manager checks for updates.

checkForAppsUpdates.title: Check for Apps Updates
checkForAppsUpdates.description: Determines how often App Manager checks for apps updates.

newAppsCheckForUpdates.title: Check for Updates Frequency Setting for New Apps
newAppsCheckForUpdates.description: Determines the check for updates frequency setting for new apps.

newAppsAutoUpdate.title: Auto Update Setting for New Apps
newAppsAutoUpdate.description: Determines the auto update setting for new apps.

startAtLaunch.title: Start at Launch
startAtLaunch.description: Determines whether App Manager starts at launch.

minimizeToTray.title: Minimize to Tray
minimizeToTray.description: Determines whether App Manager minimizes to the tray when closed.

compactPaths.title: Compact Paths
compactPaths.description: Determines whether App Manager compacts paths in the interface.

goesToTray.title: Goes to Tray Notification
goesToTray.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when the app goes to the tray.

exitDuringWork.title: Exit During Work Notification
exitDuringWork.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when the app is exited during work.

exitDuringAppRun.title: Exit During App Run Notification
exitDuringAppRun.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when the app is exited during an app run.

updateDone.title: Update Done Notification
updateDone.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when an update is done.

updateFailed.title: Update Failed Notification
updateFailed.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when an update fails.

appInstallDone.title: App Install Done Notification
appInstallDone.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when an app install is done.

appInstallFailed.title: App Install Failed Notification
appInstallFailed.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when an app install fails.

appUninstallDone.title: App Uninstall Done Notification
appUninstallDone.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when an app uninstall is done.

appUninstallFailed.title: App Uninstall Failed Notification
appUninstallFailed.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when an app uninstall fails.

appExecFailed.title: App Launch Failed Notification
appExecFailed.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when an app launch fails.

requestWorkerFailed.title: Request Failed Notification
requestWorkerFailed.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when a request for getting updates or apps fails.

processAlreadyRunning.title: Process Already Running Notification
processAlreadyRunning.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when a process is already running.

processEnded.title: Process Ended Notification
processEnded.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when a process ends.

processKilled.title: Process Killed Notification
processKilled.description: Determines if a notification will be sent when a process is killed.

github.title: GitHub Token
github.description: The GitHub token used to increase the rate limit.
github.createToken: Check out the documentation to learn how to create a token.

followedApps.title: Followed Apps
followedApps.description: Select apps to follow that will show in the install menu. These apps will also be checked for updates.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Select categories to show in the app side panel. You can edit the category of an application in its settings.

EditCategoryIconDialog.title: App Manager > Settings > Categories > Edit Icon

predefinedIcons.title: Predefined Icons
predefinedIcons.description: A list of predefined icons available for the app.

icon.title: Icon
icon.dialog: App Manager > Settings > Categories > Edit Icon > Icon

clearData.title: Clear Data
clearData.description: Clears all data stored by App Manager and restarts the app.

importData.title: Import Data
importData.description: Imports data from a file and restarts the app. This will overwrite all data.

QFileDialog.importData: App Manager > Settings > Data > Import Data
QFileDialog.exportData: App Manager > Settings > Data > Export Data
